subject: king plus font in open office
msgSnippet: Can anyone get the king-plus font to work in open-office on linux. (It does work with every other text program that I run on linux, eg: KOffice).
messageBody:
Can anyone get the king-plus font to work in open-office on linux. (It
does work with every other text program that I run on linux, eg:
KOffice).
